:• 2x '''2167Mbps''' - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan., 1024-QAM), :• 1x '''1000Mbps''' - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 1024-QAM) = '''''5400 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC5400 MU-MIMO Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/Archer-C5400X.html}}{{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=Archer-C5400X}} Web GUI: http://tplinkwifi.net ===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/tp-link-archer-c5400x-review ''TP-Link Archer C5400X Review'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] ===See also=== *[[TP-LINK Archer VR2800v]] - AC2800 VDSL2 Modem Wi-Fi Router :CPU: [[Broadcom]] @1GHz Dual Core, Flash: 512MB, RAM: 1GB :AC2800 Wave2 (2167+600Mbps), 4×4 MU-MIMO, 1024QAM :VDSL2/VDSL 35b (Super VDSL), DECT, VoIP, CAT-iq 2.0 *[[TP-LINK RE650 v1.x]] - AC2600 Wi-Fi Extender/Access Point :AC2600 Wave2 (1733+800Mbps), 802.11ac, 4×4 MU-MIMO
